Dream Priestess:
Greetings! I am the Dream Priestess, and I'll be your guide in the Dreamland.
I help those who are willing to enter the Dream Dungeon.
But the journey there is dangerous. You have to gather a party or a command channel of 2-10 people whose level is 76 or higher. I won't let you in, otherwise.
To prevent a potential invasion in the Dreamland, the Dream Dungeon gates are opened only once a week.
Are you ready to go inside?
